verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I've got glory comin' at me from
both sides.
I've got glory fl owin' over me in tides.
I've got glory shinin' on me like
sunshine, it seems
And it's You, my Father, beloved guide.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
We speak His Word throughout the land
As we sit at His right hand
Our names are written in the book with His blood.
As we move in unity,
We shall set the captives free
And we long to hear the words,
“Well done, my son.”
